name: Dallas' Bad Day
description:
The screenshots are from the game PAYDAY 2, but with a texture mod installed.

The music, in order, within the game are as follows:

Trailer by Musway Studio

Ambient Relaxing by Musway Studio

Electronica Synthwave Futuristic Utopia by Oleksandr Koltsov

Ambient Inspiring by Musway Studio

Dallas' Bad Day by Botless is marked with CC0 1.0
